message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is likely to be much higher. I'm confident you'll love it!
